DarkMouse::

She wondered why this bot had tried to contact her.  She stopped and 
stared up at the sky. "Who was he? I know him, but from where?"  Her 
recall circuits hadn't come fully on line yet. She still felt tired 
and stiff from her long sleep.  She looked around wondering if this 
bot would show himself. She kept going, but ever so causiously.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron stopped he sensed her desire to meet  her old friends. 
This was a 
> lost cause. And no one as of yet new he was alive. So he made the 
decesion to 
> abandon this mission and went back to the ship on the way he saw a 
bug 
> mountain. His frustraion and anger from all his life;s tortures 
boiled to the 
> surface. He made a giant ball of energy from his hands and 
incenerated the 
> mountian. A mushroom cloud hit the sky. It took out almost all his 
energy. He 
> slowly glided towrds his home base.
